author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Chong Chee Keong v Official Assignee
counsel: Mohan Singh and Jorita Koh (K K Yap and Partners) for the plaintiff; Kamala Ponnampalam (Assistant Official Assignee) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Insolvency Law/Bankruptcy/Discharge/Official Assignee filing proof of debt on bankrupt's behalf against company in liquidation/Dividend from liquidated company declared in favour of bankrupt after bankrupt discharged from bankruptcy/Whether Official Assignee entitled to dividend to pay bankrupt's creditors
